body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(c1[RngHomo]c2)↔((c1 ∈ Rng ∧ c2 ∈ Rng)∧(c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2)∧ c0 ∈((mulGrp ` c1)[MgmHom](mulGrp ` c2)))))
⊣ (mulGrp ` c1)=(mulGrp ` c1)
⊣ (mulGrp ` c2)=(mulGrp ` c2)

comment: Each unital ring homomorphism is a non-unital ring homomorphism. (Contributed by AV, 29-Feb-2020.)
